media:group.media:title: Plant Tropisms- Amoeba Sisters #Shorts
media:group.media:description:
In this Short, The Amoeba Sisters introduce a few plant tropisms: phototropism, thigmotropism, and gravitropism. Remember there are more than these - expand description to learn more! To see our Amoeba Sisters Shorts Playlist, visit https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLwL0Myd7Dk1Hby0rih8yhnwGUv9lb-2PB  To see our longer biology content videos, see our biology learning playlist here https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLwL0Myd7Dk1F0iQPGrjehze3eDpco1eVz  #shorts #amoebasisters #amoebasistersshort

-------------
Factual Reference:
Clark, Mary Ann, et al. “Introduction - Biology 2e - OpenStax.” Biology 2e Openstax.org, OpenStax, 28 Mar. 2018, https://openstax.org/books/biology-2e/pages/30-6-plant-sensory-systems-and-responses.

--------------
Note: There are more tropisms than this Short mentioned! The factual reference above lists others as well as some of the plant hormones that are involved.
